posts.post_content:
The [Inquisition](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Inquisition), let's begin!  
The Inquisition, [look out sin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=158765)!  
We have a mission to [convert](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=230070) the Jews  
We're gonna [teach](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Brainwash) them wrong from right  
We're gonna help them [see the light](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Illuminate)  
And make an [offer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=183007) that they can't refuse!  
  
[Confess](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Confessor)   
Don't be [boring](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=19569)  
Say yes   
Don't be dull  
  
A [fact](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=247186)  
you're ignoring:  
it's better to lose your [skullcap](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=skullclamp) than your [skull](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Necropotence)  
  
The Inquisition, what a show  
The Inquisition, here we go  
We know you're [wishing](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=34400)  
That we'd [go away](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Counterspell)  
But the Inquisition's here and autocard multiv... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
